title: Proper Aberdeen Angus Beef Stew
ingredients: ['250 to 350g (1/2 to 3/4 lb) of stewing steak, cubed', '1 teaspoon oil', '1 small swede, peeled and cubed', '2 carrots, peeled and chopped', '1 parsnip, peeled and chopped', '1 handful peas', '1 handful sweetcorn kernels', '1 clove of garlic, crushed', '2 beef stock cubes', '2 vegetable stock cubes', 'salt, pepper and mixed herbs to taste', 'boiling water', 'Dumplings', '225g (8 oz) self raising flour', '110g (4 oz) butter', 'pinch of salt', 'cold water']
